blind.description: Low vision score — place and destroy more wards.

tagAlong.description: Daily reminder to thank your carry

poor.description: Low gold compared to lane opponent

coward.description: Low kill participation and high KDA in a loss. Go get in there, coward.

atm.description: Making the enemy team rich, one death at a time

honoraryCarry.description: Supports support, you uh... do something else

forgotYourButtons.description: Those summoner spells are meant to be used

mapControl0.description: The minimap is the thing in the corner

allergicToDodging.description: Have you tried pressing the right mouse button?

bigThrow.description: How do you lose with that gold lead?

lastHitTutorialNeeded.description: The minions under tower had families

dragonsHoard.description: Can't take it with you, friend — {value} unspent gold

afkFarmer.description: Nice farm, where were you in the fights?

paperTank.description: Built tank items but forgot to press buttons

worksBetterAlone.description: Get more solo kills than team kills

buffDeliveryService.description: Took both buffs just to deliver them to the enemy

selfCare.description: Tanky for yourself, not for your team

decorationEnthusiast.description: Those control wards sure look pretty

flashGaming.description: The F key is for Fight. {value} multikills after aggressive flashes

monsterTamer.description: Let Baron and Dragon do the work

blastEm.description: Blast cone'd away from opponents {value} times

hideAndSeekChampion.description: They can't kill you if they can't find you

dancePartner.description: Made sure Herald had fun before work

snowball.description: Once you get ahead, you stay ahead

balancedDiet.description: Equal parts physical and magical damage

mercenary.description: Your lane is wherever you're needed

youreWelcome.description: High KDA and kill participation in a win, with teammates who lagged behind.

midIsMyNewBestFriend.text: Mid is My New Best Friend
midIsMyNewBestFriend.description: High kill participation and KDA as a support, with the bot lane doing poorly.

imTheCarryNow.description: Dealt more damage as a support than the bot lane, in a win.

arentYouForgettingSomeone.description: Dealt more damage as a support than the bot lane, in a loss. Play a different role, maybe?

stomper.description: High gold lead against lane opponent

betterTogether.description: Team good together, team strong together.

coolTurret.description: Killed enemies under their own turret {value} times

darkness.description: The enemy team is playing with their monitors off

laneKingdom.description: Huge CS lead of {value} over lane opponent

hesGotANoNoGoing.text: He's got a no no going
hesGotANoNoGoing.description: No deaths to champions in ARAM

dontEverSayItsOver.text: Don't ever say it's over if I'm breathin'
dontEverSayItsOver.description: Turned a {value} kill deficit into victory

visionDomination.description: Complete vision control over the game

objectiveSupremacy.description: Controlled every major objective on the map

carryingIsKindOfSupporting.text: Carrying is a kind of supporting, yes?
carryingIsKindOfSupporting.description: Supporting a team of feeders to victory (Win a game as support with poor performing teammates)

justDoinMyJob.description: Carrying a team of feeders to victory (Win a game as bot with poor performing teammates)

kingOfDaJungle.description: Carrying a team of feeders to victory (Win a game as jungle with poor performing teammates)

notSoMiddling.description: Carrying a team of feeders to victory (Win a game as mid with poor performing teammates)

itsCalledTopLaneForAReason.text: It's called top lane for a reason
itsCalledTopLaneForAReason.description: Carrying a team of feeders to victory (Win a game as top with poor performing teammates)
